SEARCH

Class CustomAssaultRifle

java.lang.Object
AssaultRifle
CustomAssaultRifle
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShotEngine
public class CustomAssaultRifle extends AssaultRifle implements ShotEngine
The CustomAssaultRifle class extends the abstract class AssaultRifle and implements the ShotEngine interface. This class provides extended shooting methods and uses them to display shooting information.
Since:
1.0
See Also:

    • CustomAssaultRifle

      public CustomAssaultRifle(String model, int ammunition, boolean enlargedMagazine) throws IOException
      Constructor for the CustomAssaultRifle class.
      Parameters:
      model - The model of the rifle
      ammunition - The amount of ammunition
      enlargedMagazine - A flag for an enlarged magazine
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown in case of I/O errors

    • CustomAssaultRifle

      public CustomAssaultRifle(String model, int ammunition, double caliber, double weight, double price, boolean scope, boolean muffler, boolean enlargedMagazine) throws IOException
      Creates a new CustomAssaultRifle object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      model - the model of the assault rifle.
      ammunition - the initial ammunition count.
      caliber - the caliber of the assault rifle.
      weight - the weight of the assault rifle in kilograms.
      price - the price of the assault rifle in dollars.
      scope - true if the assault rifle has a scope, false otherwise.
      muffler - true if the assault rifle has a muffler, false otherwise.
      enlargedMagazine - true if the assault rifle has an enlarged magazine, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while opening the log file.

  • Method Details

    • automaticFire

      public void automaticFire(int bullets, double accuracy)
      Extended automatic fire method with specified accuracy.
      Parameters:
      bullets - The number of bullets to fire
      accuracy - The accuracy of the shots, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0

    • burstFire

      public void burstFire(int bullets, String sound)
      Extended burst fire method with a specified sound.
      Parameters:
      bullets - The number of bullets to fire
      sound - The sound of the shots

    • singleFire

      public void singleFire(int bullets, String target)
      Extended single shot method with a specified target.
      Parameters:
      bullets - The number of bullets to fire
      target - The target being fired upon
